example.text: At the same time, House Republicans pushed through a measure to weaken regulations on stabilizing braces for firearms, an accessory used in several mass shootings across our country over the last decade. Enough is enough.

96 Dear , In his State of the Union Address, President Biden laid out his economic agenda, calling for Democrats and Republicans to work together to continue building an economy that works for all Americans, keeps boosting our competitiveness in the world, and brings the country together. I want to hear from you.

I've also worked closely with other members of Hawai'i's congressional delegation to introduce bills that would increase Medicare reimbursement payments for skilled nursing facilities; reduce air traffic noise and increase safety in our skies; and provide federal resources in combating Rapid ?

For the sponsor of this amendment to be proud of taking a meat cleaver to DEI flies in the face of all Americans and the diversity that we represent. What this reckless amendment and this obsession over DEI really exposes is a callous disregard for these servicemembers and their experiences.

Sincerely, Rep. Jill Tokuda Member of Congress Sign up for my newsletter to get updates on this issue and others! Sign Up Contact Me Washington DC Office 1005 Longworth House Office Building Washington, DC 20515 Phone: (202) 225-4906 from future messages.

This amendment to terminate DEI offices and personnel and all of the insidious DEI-related amendments we have had to hear and will hear tonight by my Republican colleagues aren't just harmful to our national security--they are a major threat. It is time we set aside the political games that we are seeing and get serious about our national security and stand by our servicemen and -women of all backgrounds who have given up so much in defense of our country and to keep all of us safe.

I hope you're able to make it! I plan to cover my first 70 days in office working for the people of Hawai'i's Second Congressional District, including the bills that I've sponsored and my priorities for the 118th Congress.
